ai-patthana17.11:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.11:1.1_0: You haven’t declared: ‘This is a limited principle.’
ai-patthana17.11:2.1_0: expansive teaching doesn’t arise because of the skillful.
ai-patthana17.11:3.1_0: Neglect gives rise to the teaching. Skilled in causes.
